    scplots Tutorial

    2020-08-03

    vignette_scplots.Rmd
    library(scplots)

    Dimensionality Reduction

    sc_dimred

    Plotting function to visualize a scatter plot of dimensionality reduction (t-SNE, UMAP, PCA) results that highlight cells based on a phenotypic assignment.

    cat("Hey Hey")

    Hey Hey

    plot(1:10,1:10)

    sc_dimred_express

    Plotting function to visualize a scatter plot of dimensionality reduction (t-SNE, UMAP, PCA) results that highlight cells based on a phenotypic assignment.

    cat("Hey Hey")

    Hey Hey

    plot(1:10,1:10)

    Heatmap

    sc_heatmap

    Plotting function to visualize a scatter plot of dimensionality reduction (t-SNE, UMAP, PCA) results that highlight cells based on a phenotypic assignment.

    cat("Hey Hey")

    Hey Hey

    plot(1:10,1:10)

    Table

    sc_table

    For plotting a table

    cat("Hey Hey")

    Hey Hey

    plot(1:10,1:10)
